addmembertogroup.name: AddMemberToGroup
addmembertogroup.description: Grants permission to add a member to a group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

completevirtualmfadeviceregistration.name: CompleteVirtualMfaDeviceRegistration
completevirtualmfadeviceregistration.description: Grants permission to complete the creation process of a virtual MFA device

completewebauthndeviceregistration.name: CompleteWebAuthnDeviceRegistration
completewebauthndeviceregistration.description: Grants permission to complete the registration process of a WebAuthn device

createalias.name: CreateAlias
createalias.description: Grants permission to create an alias for the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

createbearertoken.name: CreateBearerToken
createbearertoken.description: Grants permission to create a bearer token for a given provisioning tenant

createexternalidpconfigurationfordirecto.name: CreateExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
createexternalidpconfigurationfordirecto.description: Grants permission to create an External Identity Provider configuration for the directory

creategroup.name: CreateGroup
creategroup.description: Grants permission to create a group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

createprovisioningtenant.name: CreateProvisioningTenant
createprovisioningtenant.description: Grants permission to create a provisioning tenant for a given directory

createuser.name: CreateUser
createuser.description: Grants permission to create a user in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

deletebearertoken.name: DeleteBearerToken
deletebearertoken.description: Grants permission to delete a bearer token

deleteexternalidpcertificate.name: DeleteExternalIdPCertificate
deleteexternalidpcertificate.description: Grants permission to delete the given external IdP certificate

deleteexternalidpconfigurationfordirecto.name: DeleteExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
deleteexternalidpconfigurationfordirecto.description: Grants permission to delete an External Identity Provider configuration associated with the directory

deletegroup.name: DeleteGroup
deletegroup.description: Grants permission to delete a group from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

deletemfadeviceforuser.name: DeleteMfaDeviceForUser
deletemfadeviceforuser.description: Grants permission to delete a MFA device by device name for a given user

deleteprovisioningtenant.name: DeleteProvisioningTenant
deleteprovisioningtenant.description: Grants permission to delete the provisioning tenant

deleteuser.name: DeleteUser
deleteuser.description: Grants permission to delete a user from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

describedirectory.name: DescribeDirectory
describedirectory.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

describegroup.name: DescribeGroup
describegroup.description: Grants permission to query the group data, not including user and group members

describegroups.name: DescribeGroups
describegroups.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about groups from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

describeprovisioningtenant.name: DescribeProvisioningTenant
describeprovisioningtenant.description: Grants permission to describes the provisioning tenant

describeuser.name: DescribeUser
describeuser.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a user from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

describeuserbyuniqueattribute.name: DescribeUserByUniqueAttribute
describeuserbyuniqueattribute.description: Grants permission to describe user with a valid unique attribute represented for the user

describeusers.name: DescribeUsers
describeusers.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about user from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

disableexternalidpconfigurationfordirect.name: DisableExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
disableexternalidpconfigurationfordirect.description: Grants permission to disable authentication of end users with an External Identity Provider

disableuser.name: DisableUser
disableuser.description: Grants permission to deactivate a user in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

enableexternalidpconfigurationfordirecto.name: EnableExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
enableexternalidpconfigurationfordirecto.description: Grants permission to enable authentication of end users with an External Identity Provider

enableuser.name: EnableUser
enableuser.description: Grants permission to activate user in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

getawsspconfigurationfordirectory.name: GetAWSSPConfigurationForDirectory
getawsspconfigurationfordirectory.description: Grants permission to retrieve the AWS IAM Identity Center Service Provider configurations for the directory

getgroupid.name: GetGroupId
getgroupid.description: Grants permission to retrieve ID information about group from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

getuserid.name: GetUserId
getuserid.description: Grants permission to retrieve ID information about user from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

getuserpoolinfo.name: GetUserPoolInfo
getuserpoolinfo.description: (Deprecated) Grants permission to get UserPool Info

importexternalidpcertificate.name: ImportExternalIdPCertificate
importexternalidpcertificate.description: Grants permission to import the IdP certificate used for verifying external IdP responses

ismemberingroup.name: IsMemberInGroup
ismemberingroup.description: Grants permission to check if a member is a part of the group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

ismemberingroups.name: IsMemberInGroups
ismemberingroups.description: Grants permission to check if a member is a part of multiple groups in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

listbearertokens.name: ListBearerTokens
listbearertokens.description: Grants permission to list bearer tokens for a given provisioning tenant

listexternalidpcertificates.name: ListExternalIdPCertificates
listexternalidpcertificates.description: Grants permission to list the external IdP certificates of a given directory and IdP

listexternalidpconfigurationsfordirector.name: ListExternalIdPConfigurationsForDirectory
listexternalidpconfigurationsfordirector.description: Grants permission to list all the External Identity Provider configurations created for the directory

listgroups.name: ListGroups
listgroups.description: Grants permission to list groups from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

listgroupsformember.name: ListGroupsForMember
listgroupsformember.description: Grants permission to list groups of the target member

listgroupsforuser.name: ListGroupsForUser
listgroupsforuser.description: Grants permission to list groups for a user from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

listmembersingroup.name: ListMembersInGroup
listmembersingroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve all members that are part of a group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

listmfadevicesforuser.name: ListMfaDevicesForUser
listmfadevicesforuser.description: Grants permission to list all active MFA devices and their MFA device metadata for a user

listprovisioningtenants.name: ListProvisioningTenants
listprovisioningtenants.description: Grants permission to list provisioning tenants for a given directory

listusers.name: ListUsers
listusers.description: Grants permission to list users from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

removememberfromgroup.name: RemoveMemberFromGroup
removememberfromgroup.description: Grants permission to remove a member that is part of a group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

searchgroups.name: SearchGroups
searchgroups.description: Grants permission to search for groups within the associated directory

searchusers.name: SearchUsers
searchusers.description: Grants permission to search for users within the associated directory

startvirtualmfadeviceregistration.name: StartVirtualMfaDeviceRegistration
startvirtualmfadeviceregistration.description: Grants permission to begin the creation process of virtual mfa device

startwebauthndeviceregistration.name: StartWebAuthnDeviceRegistration
startwebauthndeviceregistration.description: Grants permission to begin the registration process of a WebAuthn device

updateexternalidpconfigurationfordirecto.name: UpdateExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
updateexternalidpconfigurationfordirecto.description: Grants permission to update an External Identity Provider configuration associated with the directory

updategroup.name: UpdateGroup
updategroup.description: Grants permission to update information about a group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

updategroupdisplayname.name: UpdateGroupDisplayName
updategroupdisplayname.description: Grants permission to update group display name update group display name response

updatemfadeviceforuser.name: UpdateMfaDeviceForUser
updatemfadeviceforuser.description: Grants permission to update MFA device information

updatepassword.name: UpdatePassword
updatepassword.description: Grants permission to update a password by sending password reset link via email or generating one time password for a user in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

updateuser.name: UpdateUser
updateuser.description: Grants permission to update user information in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

updateusername.name: UpdateUserName
updateusername.description: Grants permission to update user name update user name response

verifyemail.name: VerifyEmail
verifyemail.description: Grants permission to verify an email address of an User
